N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 71.6 - Accounting

State Regulations
(a) Where a liability insurance policy is issued or renewed pursuant to this Part, the insurer shall notify the insured of the insured's right, upon written request, to an accounting of legal defense costs actually expended. (b) Any policy issued or renewed pursuant to section
71.4
of this Part shall provide that, if 50 percent or more of the separate defense limit is utilized, written notification of the amount of defense coverage remaining under the policy shall be provided to the insured as soon as practicable, and the insurer shall again provide such notification at the 75 percent and 100 percent utilization levels.
